p: In vitro studies showed that the disease produced in rice grains inoculated with all tested fungi ( A. alternata, C. hawaiiensis, F. proliferatum, and F. oxysporum) was totally inhibited when the kernels were placed into PDA-clove and PDA-cinnamon ( Figure 4 ). Both essential oils completely inhibited the growth of pathogenic fungi in the caryopsis rice at 300 Î¼g/mL after 30 days of incubation.
